sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.real_name, attendance.status FROM class JOIN student ON class.id = student.class_id JOIN attendance ON student.id = attendance.student_id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND class.class_name = '计科一班' AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND attendance.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.real_name, base.status FROM base

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“年级/入学年份（如 2022 级）”映射
根据字段描述“班级名称，班级实体映射主字段”映射
